lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics:
'Rajamati kumati jike wasa pirati
haya baba Rajamati cha
Rajamati kumati jike wasa pirati
haya baba Rajamati cha
Rajamati mabila dhasa
kasi wone tela buba'

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics:
'Sah dhasa kuli kuli
mikha dhasa bala bala
sakumi ya myha macha la
Sah dhasa kuli kuli
mikha dhasa bala bala
sakumi ya myha macha la'
'khwa dhasa tuyu khwa\nkhwale niga ti du\nTahananiya Rajamati cha'

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics:
'Khen khwala dhyakhwan dan
pasa baji du dan
Rajamati Bulusulu dan
Khen khwala dhyakway dan
pasa baji dhu dan
Rajamati Bhulusulu dan'
'Rajamati gana du\nItum Bahlay chama du\nhaya biu Rajamati cha'

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics:
'Nhāpā wamha Tarhi Thakun,
lipā wamha Chirhi Thakun
Wayā lipā Rājamati-chā
Nhāpā wamha Tarhi Thakun,
lipā wamha Chirhi Thakun
Wayā lipā Rājamati-chā'
'Tarhi Thakun mayo jita,\nChirhi Thakun mile maju\nRājamati byāhā yānā biu.'

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics:
'Tarhi Thakun yā tāyo du,
Chirhi Thakun yā pāyo du
Rājamati yā bijakani du
Tarhi Thakun yā tāyo du,
Chirhi Thakun yā pāyo du
Rājamati yā bijakani du'
'Bijakani marumha, kalā jita mayo bubā\nHayā biu Rājamati-chā.'

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics:
'Thane yā Thahiti, kwane yā Kwahiti
Biche lāka Maruhiti
Thane yā Thahiti, kwane yā Kwahiti
Biche lāka Maruhiti'
'Maruhiti la kā wonha,\ntagwa lohtey lupin hānā\nRājamati thasa pāla nhā.'

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics:
'Tisā nan tiyakā, Gujerati puyakā
Rājamati bhyāhā yānā biu
Tisā nan tiyakā, Gujerati puyakā
Rājamati bhyāhā yānā biu
Rājamati bila dhāsā
Kāshi wone makhu bubā
Hayā biu Rājamati-chā'

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics:
'Chandalma lami yana
mahmah dhyaka biya chowta
latamakhula sahjhyan madugu chen..
Chandalma lami yana
mahmah dhyaka biya chowta
latamakhula sahjhyan madugu chen..
Dhikkar janama
Rajamatiya Karama'

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics:
'Rajamati kumati jike wasa pirati
haya baba Rajamati cha
Rajamati kumati jike wasa pirati
haya baba Rajamati cha
Rajamati mabila dhasa
kasi wone tela buba
haya biu Rajamati cha
'
